what_to_do.task: Manage and process employee tickets including leave encashment, health insurance endorsements, and employee group configurations.
steps: Navigate to Requests > Tickets and select the relevant ticket type such as Leave Encashment.
Review ticket requests in Pending, Approved, and Rejected tabs.
Approve or reject tickets and add internal comments as needed.
Process approved tickets through payroll or remove from payroll as applicable.
Download ticket reports for record-keeping and analysis.
For health insurance, submit new employee additions or removals with required documents and track endorsement requests.
Configure employee groups via Company Settings > Employee Structures, create groups, and assign viewership permissions to admin roles.
what_to_do.expected_outcome: Tickets are correctly reviewed, approved or rejected, processed through payroll or insurance systems, and reports are generated. Employee groups are configured with appropriate permissions and endorsements are tracked successfully.

what_to_watch_out_for.issue: Complexity and limitations in custom role and policy configuration for employee tickets.
what_to_watch_out_for.limitation: The platform requires manual backend intervention to assign or create custom roles and policies. There is no self-service or UI-based mechanism for granular role and approval flow configuration. Role-based permission settings for ticket priority and approval are prone to misconfiguration.
what_to_watch_out_for.workaround: Coordinate with backend or support teams to configure custom roles and policies. Use predefined system roles where possible. Monitor role assignments carefully to avoid unintended permission grants.

what_to_watch_out_for.issue: Lack of dynamic reporting features for employee tickets.
what_to_watch_out_for.limitation: The platform does not currently support displaying counts of pending employee tickets or flexible type configuration across companies.
what_to_watch_out_for.workaround: Manually track ticket statuses outside the platform or request backend support for reporting needs.

what_to_watch_out_for.issue: No support for leave encashment as a defined ticket type within employee tickets.
what_to_watch_out_for.limitation: The platform has a strategic limitation and will not implement leave encashment ticket type functionality at this time.
what_to_watch_out_for.workaround: Manage leave encashment requests through alternative workflows or manual processes outside the employee tickets module.
